title: Firefox is not Downloading fonts for websites
content: Certain websites I visit will fail to display custom fonts, unless I clear cookies, where it works fine until I refresh the page, either by signing back in, or reloading. the screenshots I have are of https://developer.android.com/studio/install this is one of the sites that gives me the issue. I have tried disabling all of my extensions, and it still doesn't fix the issue. Any help would be appreciated.
creator: andrewkropf401

title: The page does not open
content:
The system page does not open and gives an error

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to 186.tax.gov.ir. 

   The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Learn more…

title: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/keyboard-shortcuts-perform-firefox-tasks-quickly?as=u&utm_source=inproduct&redirectslug=Keyboard+shortcuts&redirectlocale=en-US
content: Please tell me whether it's possible to create a quick reference for this type of page, which can be edited with a word processor, to highlight some of the contents, or remove those which are obvious to me, the user. Wordpad would be the most desirable for this. Many thanks

title: Firefox not loading
content: When I go to load firefox I get the error message that says that it is already loaded. Task Manager shows that Firefox is loaded three times even though I clicked on the icon in the tray only once. Due to this I cannot get on Firefox. It is the browser that I always use. It worked yesterday.
creator: holtcapital

title: cannot open firefox
content:

I tried system restore with no luck. I have hundreds of bookmarks and they are now gone.

Any suggestions?
